00049       function                      mkdir_ex( $Path )
00050       {
00051             @mkdir( $Path );

00073       function                      get_package_version_s( $ClassName )
00074       {
00075             $ClassVersion = explode( '_' , $ClassName );
00076             $ClassVersionRet = '';
00077             $ClassVersionRet = array_pop( $ClassVersion ).$ClassVersionRet;
00078             $ClassVersionRet = array_pop( $ClassVersion ).'.'.$ClassVersionRet;
00079             $ClassVersionRet = array_pop( $ClassVersion ).'.'.$ClassVersionRet;
00080             return( $ClassVersionRet );
00081       }
00082       
00119       function                get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion = 'last' , $PackageScriptPath = false )
00120       {
00121             try
00122             {
00123                   list( $Fetched , $Object ) = _try_fetch_from_cache( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00124             
00125                   global            $ObjectLabel;
00126                   if( $Fetched )
00127                   {
00128                         $ObjectLabel = 'default';
00129                         return( $Object );
00130                   }
00131                   
00132                   _fill_package_paths_cache( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath );
00133                   _store_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00134                   $PackageClassName = _package_script_fast_load( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00135                   
00136                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ObjectLabel";
00137                   _store_package_object( $PackageClassName , $Key );
00138                   
00139                   global            $PackageCache;
00140                   global            $PackagePathsCache;
00141                   $ObjectLabel = 'default';
00142                   return( $PackageCache[ $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ][ 'path' ] ] );
00143             }
00144             catch( Exception $e )
00145             {
00146                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00147             }
00148       }
00149       
00150       $GetPackageObjectCache = array();
00151       
00183       function                get_package_object( $PackageName , $PackageVersion = 'last' , $PackageScriptPath = false )
00184       {
00185             try
00186             {
00187                   list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _get_package_info_after_rewrites( 
00188                         $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath
00189                   );
00190                   
00191                   global            $GetPackageObjectCache;
00192                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion";
00193                   
00194                   if( isset( $GetPackageObjectCache[ $Key ] ) === false )
00195                   {
00196                         get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath );
00197                         
00198                         $GetPackageObjectCache[ $Key ] = _get_requested_class_name();
00199                   }
00200                   
00201                   $ClassName = $GetPackageObjectCache[ $Key ];
00202                   
00203                   return( new $ClassName() );
00204             }
00205             catch( Exception $e )
00206             {
00207                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00208             }
00209       }
